content: lion brand pattern # 40437 *chs-childsponchos pdf* published in crochet fantasy crochet magazine jo-ann simply creative crochet skill level easy level 2 size child 5-6 child 9-10 child 13-14 to fit chest 20 24 28 51 61 71 cm circumference 29½ 33 37 75 84 94 cm at lower edge length 7 9 11½ 18 23 29 cm gauge 6 5 single_crochet + 8 row = 4 10 cm with mc on larger hook 6 5 sts + 4 row = 4 10 cm in body pattern with mc on larger hook mc landscapes® article #540 *discontinued* 165-220 yards cc homespun® article #790 1 ball crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers 1 \ 2 5 cm pin back for daisy optional sewing needle and matching thread for daisy optional pattern v_stitch poncho yoke is worked in rounds body is worked in row design features optional ball fringe and applique daisy see also toddler s poncho #40437-1 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/toddlers-poncho-40437-1
